about_the_game:
Official QQ discussion group:

864879210 (How to open the content you want)

Protagonist 1 boy, cultivate goodwill, then call for a date, there is the content you want~

Protagonist 2 girl, do what you want~

About us:

HI, we are R.Y.Love♂!

We hope to create a highly free urban life.

Here we can go in and out of different places at will, and capture many types of girls, and there will also be various events triggered.

Game introduction:

In this game, you play a boy who just graduated from college. When you first enter the society, you work hard while having feelings with girls of various professions in the society.

Players can explore more related content and unlock more exciting plots by improving the girl's goodwill.

Character introduction:

Nurse sister

Lawyer sister

Childhood sweetheart fitness girl

Idol singer trainee

Company boss lady

Game features:

● Free exploration of the map, each building has its own function, its own apartment, office building, restaurant, factory, gym, etc.

● 5 girls can be conquered, each girl has 10 plots, the higher the plot, the higher the favorability, you can date and unlock private emotional content.

● Each girl has a related mini-game, which can improve various ability values, and ability values ​​can promote the progress of the plot

More:

This game is in the early version stage, the game package is only 1.2G, but new content will be updated every month, the content is rich and exciting, please look forward to it!

Please speak freely in this group and express your new expectations for the game, we will definitely make every effort to make progress!

Unlike other similar games, our game has but is not limited to exciting content, and will definitely bring you a new experience!

content_descriptors.notes: There is some violence and sexual innuendo involved in the game, and there is no sexual assault/non-consensual sexual acts, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 10.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: ACG love adventure game with free exploration. There are 5 different girls in the male protagonist mode (there is always one you like~) The female protagonist mode can do many things (just what you want~)
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
